name: When the Light is Off
description:
Go back into childhood and face your fears by fighting your nighmares !

During daytime, help the baby to find his most loved items  to help him fight his fears.
And during nighttime, avoid the monsters to reach the baby's bed in a tower defense gameplay !

This Game was made during the Extra Credits Game Jam #3, with the theme Cycles. We are a team of  students in Game Design and in Concept Art.

The game is still in development, we will soon upload a new version debugged and upgraded !

We hope you enjoy this little game !
